member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize the class variables as needed

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetAuthorizationToken
member.summary: Opens a connection to EVE SSO server and gets an authorization token to get an access token

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetAuthorizationfromWeb(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the login for EVE SSO and returns the data stream from a successful log in

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetAccessToken(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int64@,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the Access Token data from the EVE server for authorization or refresh tokens.
member.param: If the token is Authorization or Refresh

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetPublicData(System.String,System.DateTime@,System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for public data for the URL sent. If not found, returns nothing
member.param: Full public data URL as a string
member.returns: Byte Array of response or nothing if call fails

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetPrivateAuthorizedData(System.String,EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESITokenData,System.DateTime,System.DateTime@,System.Int64,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Queries the server for private, authorized data for data sent. Function will check the authorization token and update the sent variable and DB data if expired.
member.returns: Returns data response as a string

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.FormatTokenData(EVE_Isk_per_Hour.SavedTokenData)
member.summary: Formats a SavedTokenData object to ESITokenData

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.FormatESIDate(System.String)
member.summary: Formats string dates returned from the ESI server into a date object
member.param: ESI date value as a string
member.returns: Date object of the sent date as a string

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.SetCharacterData(System.Boolean,EVE_Isk_per_Hour.SavedTokenData@,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int64@)
member.summary: Gets verification and public data about the character returned from logging into the EVE SSO and authorizing access for a new character first logging in. If the character has already been loaded, then update the data.
member.returns: Returns boolean if the function was successful in setting character data.

member.name: M:EVE_Isk_per_Hour.ESI.GetCharacterPublicData(System.Int64,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Retrieves the public data about the character ID sent
member.param: CharacterID you want public data for
member.returns: Returns data in the ESICharacterPublicData JSON property class
